title: Game crashes almost everytime while loading game
body: Every time i go to load a game, the loading screen goes black, and forces my client shut. Due to this i have gotten leaver buster twice already, and a 20 minute penalty Que. Only a few times was i able to get back in game without losing too much time. My internet is fine, and my friends client works fine on my WiFi?

replies.body:
Once you hit the champion loading screen, the game starts making connections to the server you're going to be playing on and loading all of the assets needed. If for some reason that link to the servers is interrupted it can make the loading screen freeze since it's not able to keep loading stuff. 

I'd suggest first trying to update some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) or possibly using a hardwired connection to make sure you're able to load into those matches. Make sure to test those changes in a custom game before jumping back into pvp!
Thanks! ill try it and let you know how it goes after I complete this 20 minute ban because my client kept crashing. Even though i wasn't intentionally leaving games.
